neighborhoods.name: Old Town Durres
neighborhoods.character: The historic heart of Durres featuring ancient Roman ruins, medieval fortifications, and traditional Albanian architecture.

location.description: Located in the center of Durres, containing the main archaeological sites and historic landmarks.

history.overview: Founded as Dyrrhachium by the Greeks in 627 BC, it was later a major Roman port and Byzantine stronghold.
history.significance: One of the oldest continuously inhabited cities in Albania with over 2,600 years of history.
notable_events: Foundation by Greek colonists in 627 BC
Roman conquest and development as major port

transit: Walking distance to all major sites
practical_info.safety: Very safe during day, well-patrolled tourist area with good lighting at night.
practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Early morning to avoid heat and crowds, especially at archaeological sites.
practical_info.walkability: Highly walkable with pedestrian-friendly ancient stone streets.

attractions.name: Roman Amphitheatre
attractions.description: Largest Roman amphitheatre in the Balkans, built in 2nd century AD.
attractions.appeal: Walk through ancient tunnels and imagine gladiatorial contests.

attractions.name: Archaeological Museum
attractions.description: Houses extensive collection of Illyrian, Greek, Roman, and Byzantine artifacts.
attractions.appeal: Discover Durres' rich multicultural history through ancient treasures.

attractions.name: Venetian Tower
attractions.description: 15th-century watchtower offering panoramic views of the city and sea.
attractions.appeal: Climb for spectacular views and photo opportunities.

dining.name: Taverna Tradicionale Iliria
dining.known_for: Authentic Albanian dishes in historic setting

dining.name: Kulla e Sahatit
dining.known_for: Clay pot cooking and traditional methods

activities.name: Archaeological Site Tour
activities.description: Guided exploration of Roman ruins and Byzantine remains.

activities.name: Traditional Craft Shopping
activities.description: Browse local handicrafts and traditional Albanian products.

stay_here_if: You're passionate about ancient history and archaeology
You want to experience authentic Albanian culture
avoid_if: You prefer modern amenities and nightlife
You're not interested in historical sites
insider_tips: Visit early morning for best lighting at archaeological sites.
Many sites offer combined tickets for better value.

neighborhoods.name: Beach District
neighborhoods.character: The vibrant seaside area with sandy beaches, waterfront restaurants, and summer entertainment along the Adriatic coast.

location.description: Stretches along the Adriatic Sea from the port to the southern beaches, featuring the main promenade.

history.overview: Developed as a resort destination during the communist era and modernized after 1990s for tourism.
history.significance: Albania's premier beach destination and gateway for Italian ferry passengers.

practical_info.safety: Very safe with beach patrols during summer season and good evening lighting.
practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Summer months for swimming, spring/autumn for peaceful walks.
practical_info.walkability: Excellent for walking with dedicated promenade and flat terrain.

attractions.name: Durres Main Beach
attractions.description: Several kilometers of sandy beach with clear Adriatic waters.
attractions.appeal: Relax on the sand or enjoy various water sports and beach activities.

attractions.name: Beach Promenade
attractions.description: Scenic walkway lined with cafes, restaurants, and beach access points.
attractions.appeal: Perfect for evening strolls with sunset views over the Adriatic.

attractions.name: Currila Beach
attractions.description: Less crowded beach south of the main area with cleaner waters.
attractions.appeal: Escape crowds while enjoying pristine beach environment.

dining.name: Piazza
dining.known_for: Fine dining with panoramic sea views

dining.name: Fisherman's Tavern
dining.known_for: Daily fresh catch and beachside atmosphere

activities.name: Beach Activities
activities.description: Swimming, sunbathing, beach volleyball, and water sports.

activities.name: Sunset Watching
activities.description: Enjoy spectacular sunsets over the Adriatic from the promenade.

stay_here_if: You want beach access and sea views
You enjoy waterfront dining and summer atmosphere
insider_tips: Early morning and late afternoon offer the best beach experience.
Many beachfront restaurants offer both Albanian and Italian cuisine.

neighborhoods.name: Port Area
neighborhoods.character: The working maritime heart of Durres with ferry terminals, fishing harbor, and authentic local atmosphere.

location.description: Located on the northern coast, containing the main ferry terminal and commercial port facilities.

history.overview: Ancient port that has served as Albania's main maritime gateway for over 2,000 years.
history.significance: Primary connection point between Albania and Italy, crucial for trade and transportation.
notable_events: Modern ferry service establishment to Italy

practical_info.safety: Generally safe but busy industrial area, normal urban precautions advised.
practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Early morning to see fishing boats return with daily catch.
practical_info.walkability: Moderately walkable but designed for vehicles and maritime traffic.

attractions.name: Ferry Terminal
attractions.description: Gateway to Italy with regular ferry services to Bari, Ancona, and Trieste.
attractions.appeal: Experience the main connection between Albania and Western Europe.

attractions.name: Fish Market
attractions.description: Early morning market where local fishermen sell their daily catch.
attractions.appeal: Witness authentic local life and buy the freshest seafood.

attractions.name: Harbor Walkway
attractions.description: Industrial waterfront with views of fishing boats and ferry operations.
attractions.appeal: See the working side of this historic port city.

activities.name: Ferry Travel
activities.description: Take ferry connections to Italian ports for day trips or onward travel.

activities.name: Fish Market Visit
activities.description: Early morning visit to see fishermen selling their catch.

stay_here_if: You want to experience authentic maritime culture
avoid_if: You're sensitive to industrial noise and activity
insider_tips: Visit fish market before 8 AM for best selection and atmosphere.
Ferry tickets can be purchased at the terminal or advance online.

neighborhoods.name: Modern Center
neighborhoods.character: The contemporary commercial and administrative heart with shops, cafes, government buildings, and modern amenities.

location.description: The main commercial district connecting the old town with newer developments and transport links.

history.overview: Developed primarily after 1990 as Albania modernized and opened to international commerce.
history.significance: Represents modern Albanian development and the city's adaptation to post-communist economy.

practical_info.safety: Very safe commercial area with good lighting and regular police presence.
practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Business hours for shopping, evening for dining and socializing.
practical_info.walkability: Highly walkable with pedestrian-friendly streets and squares.

attractions.name: Central Market
attractions.description: Main marketplace for fresh produce, local products, and traditional Albanian goods.
attractions.appeal: Experience local Albanian shopping culture and find authentic products.

attractions.name: Aleksandër Moisiu Theatre
attractions.description: Main theatre of Durres hosting various cultural performances.
attractions.appeal: Experience Albanian cultural performances and theatre arts.

attractions.name: Modern Shopping Streets
attractions.description: Pedestrian-friendly streets with shops, cafes, and services.
attractions.appeal: Convenient shopping and modern Albanian city life experience.

dining.name: Taverna Durresake
dining.known_for: Family atmosphere and authentic Albanian dishes

dining.name: Pizzeria Adriatiku
dining.known_for: Local pizza variations and casual dining

activities.name: Local Shopping
activities.description: Browse local shops for Albanian products, clothing, and souvenirs.

activities.name: Café Culture
activities.description: Experience traditional Albanian coffee culture in local cafes.

stay_here_if: You want modern conveniences and central location
You need easy access to transport and services
avoid_if: You prefer historic or beachfront locations
You want to avoid commercial areas
insider_tips: Central Market is best visited in early morning for freshest produce.
Many shops close for afternoon break, plan shopping accordingly.

neighborhoods.name: Residential Quarter
neighborhoods.character: Authentic residential area where locals live, offering glimpse into everyday Albanian life with family-run businesses and community atmosphere.

location.description: Residential neighborhoods surrounding the central areas, extending inland from the coast.

history.overview: Developed throughout different periods as the city expanded, showing various architectural influences.
history.significance: Represents authentic Albanian family life and community traditions.

practical_info.safety: Very safe residential area with strong community ties and family atmosphere.
practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Afternoon and early evening when community life is most active.
practical_info.walkability: Good for walking with tree-lined streets and local amenities.

attractions.name: Local Mosques
attractions.description: Community mosques representing local Islamic culture and architecture.
attractions.appeal: Experience authentic Albanian Muslim community life and architecture.

attractions.name: Neighborhood Markets
attractions.description: Small local markets serving residential communities with daily necessities.
attractions.appeal: Shop where locals do and experience authentic Albanian community life.

attractions.name: Local Parks
attractions.description: Small neighborhood parks where families gather and children play.
attractions.appeal: See authentic community life and enjoy peaceful green spaces.

dining.name: Gurra e Perrise
dining.known_for: Traditional highland cuisine in local setting

activities.name: Neighborhood Walking
activities.description: Walk through residential streets to observe authentic Albanian life.

activities.name: Local Interaction
activities.description: Interact with local families and experience Albanian hospitality.

stay_here_if: You want authentic Albanian cultural immersion
You prefer quiet, residential atmosphere away from tourists
avoid_if: You want easy access to tourist attractions
You prefer areas with abundant tourist services
insider_tips: Locals are often very hospitable and may invite you for coffee.
Basic Albanian phrases will be greatly appreciated by residents.

neighborhoods.name: Hotel Zone
neighborhoods.character: Modern tourism development area with hotels, resorts, and tourist-oriented services near the beach and main attractions.

location.description: Located between the beach area and city center, designed to serve tourism infrastructure needs.

history.overview: Developed after 1990 as Albania opened to international tourism and needed modern accommodation.
history.significance: Represents Albania's entry into international tourism market and hospitality industry.

practical_info.safety: Very safe with 24-hour hotel security and tourist police presence.
practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Any time, designed for year-round tourist comfort.
practical_info.walkability: Well-designed for tourists with clear signage and pedestrian paths.

attractions.name: Hotel Complexes
attractions.description: Modern international-standard hotels with full tourist services.
attractions.appeal: Comfortable base for exploring Durres with modern amenities.

attractions.name: Tourist Information Center
attractions.description: Central location for tourist information, maps, and tour bookings.
attractions.appeal: Get oriented and plan your Durres exploration efficiently.

attractions.name: Tourist Shopping Area
attractions.description: Shops oriented toward tourists with souvenirs and international products.
attractions.appeal: Convenient shopping for tourists with familiar international standards.

dining.name: Cafe Durres
dining.known_for: Modern cafe with sea views and WiFi

activities.name: Hotel Pool and Spa
activities.description: Relax at modern hotel facilities with pools and wellness services.

activities.name: Tour Booking
activities.description: Book organized tours and activities through hotel and tourist services.

stay_here_if: You want modern comfort and international standards
You prefer organized tourist services and amenities
avoid_if: You prefer budget or traditional accommodations
insider_tips: Hotels often have best rates when booked directly for longer stays.
Many hotels offer complimentary transport to historical sites.
